title: Secretary-General's High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation | Secretary-General | United Nations

Secretary-General's High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: Secretary-General's High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation | Secretary-General | United Nations
United Nations Secretary-General Ant贸nio Guterres today announced the launch of a High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation.
Ms. Melinda Gates, Co-Chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, and Mr. Jack Ma, Executive Chairman of Alibaba Group, have been appointed by the UN Secretary-General as Co-Chairs of the Panel.

issues.description: The supporting quote does not clearly mention the role of 'Secretary-General' being held by anyone other than Ant贸nio Guterres, who is mentioned as the announcer, not the subject of the event.
The role_ids field is set to [0], which corresponds to 'Secretary-General', but the quote does not specify who is taking on this role in the context of the event.
